segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman completely absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running full blast, and the sink is overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a puddle growing, and her foot is right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good, climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is grabbing cookies from the jar like it's his personal stash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, arm stretched out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; someone could get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage all over the cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're sneaking cookies while disaster brews.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting; it's going to collapse soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to all this?
segments.speaker: PAR
